content: en ua es de alien cat amigurumi pattern languages included all in one pdf english en pages 1 21 українська ua pages 22 42 español es pages 43 63 deutsch de pages 64 84 1 shop policy please note that this pattern is for personal use only you are not allowed to redistribute resell or share the pattern in any form whether online or offline however you are welcome to sell the finished product made from this pattern with credit given to my shop for the design thank you for respecting these terms 2 materials and tools hook 1 75 mm yarn yarnart iris 20 g / 138 m green no 927 white no 910 and black no 935 you will need 1 piece of each yarn needle sewing needle with a large eye scissors stuffing material you can use any materials that are convenient for you but ensure that all sizes and tools match the pattern requirements 3 symbols a m r amigurumi magic_ring amigurumi circle chain chain single_crochet single_crochet increase increase decrease decrease sl slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet fl front loops only bl back loops only turn turn your work so you can work back for the next row 4 head 1 3 use green yarn no 927 1 6sc an amr 6 2 6inc 12 3 1sc 1inc x6 18 4 2sc 1inc x6 24 5 3sc 1inc x6 30 2 4 6 4sc 1inc x6 36 7 -12 36sc 36 13 4sc 1dec x6 30 14 3sc 1dec x6 24 15 2sc 1dec x6 18 start stuffing the piece 16 1sc 1dec x6 12 17 6dec 5 1 3 ears make 2 pieces use green yarn no 927 1 6sc in amr 6 2 6inc 12 3 -4 12sc 12 leave a yarn tail for sewing 2 4 6 1 3 how to sew on the ears fold each ear in half to create a triangle shape similar to a cat s ear use a few stitches with a needle to secure this folded shape next pin the ears in place on the 2 4 head using stitch markers to make sure they are positioned evenly once you re happy with the placement sew the ears onto the head as shown in the nearby photos 7 eyes make 2 pieces 1 3 use black yarn no 935 1 6sc in amr 6 2 3sc 3inc 9 3 9sc leave a yarn tail for sewing 2 4 embroider small white circles on the eyes using white yarn color no 910 as shown in photo number 4 8 how to attach the eyes 1 3 and embroider the cat s face sew the eyes in place as shown in photo 1 then using black yarn color no 935 embroider the cat s nose and mouth following the examples 2 4 in photos 2 3 and 4 9 1 3 antennae make 2 pieces use green yarn no 927 1 6sc in amr 6 2 6inc 12 3
